details: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Dept., Gujarat. It aims to help farmers to protect their harvested crops from damage due to natural calamities and store them safely for better financial returns by selling at optimal prices.
benefits: Provides financial assistance to farmers for constructing crop storage structures on their farms.
Ensures protection from unforeseen weather conditions like rain and storms and enables farmers to store their produce until market prices are favorable.
eligibility: The applicant must be a land-holding farmer.
The applicant must belong to the Gujarat state.
application_process: Online application through I-Khedut Portal: https://ikhedut.gujarat.gov.in/
Select the scheme, click on the 'Apply' button and an application page will open.
Submit a new application or update an existing one.
Print and sign the application, and keep a copy.
Construct the storage structure as per government rules within the specified timeframe.
Submit the signed application and assistance case paper to the concerned office for financial support.
